title: Mounted terrorbird gnome

properties.name: description
properties.value: Mounted terrorbird gnomes are gnomes riding terrorbirds. They are stronger than regular unmounted terrorbirds. They are found spread around and to the south of the Tree Gnome Stronghold and the Battlefield. They may be killed for the bird slayer task. They attack with melee and are weak for their level, and consequently aren't very hard to kill.

Mounted terrorbird gnomes are gnomes riding terrorbirds. They are stronger than regular unmounted terrorbirds. They are found spread around and to the south of the Tree Gnome Stronghold and the Battlefield. They may be killed for the bird slayer task. They attack with melee and are weak for their level, and consequently aren't very hard to kill.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
29 March 2004
(update)

The NPC was permanently added with the launch of RuneScape 2.

2 February 2004
(update)

The NPC was released ingame to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

1 December 2003
(update)

The level 31 variant was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta cache.
